about.title: Who We Are?
about.text: Welcome to Sky Restaurant and Pool Bar, a hidden gem located in the peaceful village of Mirkovci, just a few steps from Skopje. What began as a modest vision in 2021 has grown into a vibrant destination where delicious food, refreshing drinks and summer vibes come together in perfect harmony.
about.more-text: Founded by Viktor, a hardworking enthusiast with a passion for creating unforgettable experiences, the initial concept—then called Sky Vibe—was a cocktail bar intended to bring a touch of sophistication to the young and energetic. But Viktor's ambition and dedication transformed this space into a full-fledged restaurant with a large pool, a place where everyone can enjoy a unique combination of relaxation and gastronomic delight. Today, Sky Restaurant and Pool Bar offers much more than just drinks - our menu is filled with delicious dishes prepared with love, from fresh salads to decadent desserts, while the pool adds a touch of summer magic for all our guests. Whether you're here to relax by the water, enjoy a family lunch, or have fun with friends under the stars, we are dedicated to offering you top-notch service and a warm atmosphere. Our story is proof of what can be achieved with hard work, creativity, and a desire to create something special. Join us at Sky Restaurant and Pool Bar and be part of this delicious journey that continues to grow and inspire!
